(Re-)Install VMWARE Tools

  1. On VMWare VMs, Install VMWare tools
    cd /var/tmp
wget http://pablsv01/drivers/vmwaretools.tar
    tar xf /var/tmp/vmwaretools.tar
cd VMwareTools-9.0.0-782409
sudo ./vmware-install.pl --default

    Cleanup 

    sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/vmwaretools.tar /var/tmp/VMwareTools-9.0.0-782409
